content: earth day purse by stacy santiago pattern size f hook or size needed to get gauge gauge 13 single_crochet to 4 bag without handles 14 wide by 9 3/4 deep materials needed 600 yards of sugar n cream bag is worked double stranded for strength in bag pictured one yarn was a variegated green key lime pie and the second as just beige chain 31 round 1 skipping 1st chain single_crochet in the next 29 chains single_crochet 3x in the next chain do not turn work into the other side of the chain to form an oval single_crochet into the next 29 chains single_crochet 3x in the next chain do not join the round cont to work without turning round 2 single_crochet in the next 29 single_crochet single_crochet 2x in the next single_crochet 3 times repeat once more for other side do not join do not turn round 3 single_crochet in the next 29 single_crochet single_crochet 2x in the next single_crochet single_crochet in the next 4 single_crochet single_crochet 2x in the next single_crochet repeat once more for other side single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet slip to join do not turn round 4 chain 2 double_crochet in 33 single_crochet double_crochet 3x in the next single_crochet double_crochet in next 36 single_crochet double_crochet 3x in the next single_crochet double_crochet into the next 5 single_crochet slip to join cut yarn and tie off fold bottom of purse in half and mark so that you will have a sense of center round 5 do not work into the tops of the stitches from previous work around the post of the double_crochet starting at the marked stitch double_crochet into each post around slip to join do not turn 80 double crochets round 6 chain 2 and double_crochet into next 18 posts counting chain there should at 19 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next post 2x double_crochet into next 38 posts double_crochet 2x into next post 2x double_crochet into the next 19 posts slip to join do not turn round 7 chain 2 and double_crochet into next 19 double_crochet counting chain there should at 20 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into next 40 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into the next 19 double_crochet slip to join do not turn round 8 chain 1 single_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 9 chain 2 and double_crochet into next 20 single_crochet counting chain there should at 21 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next single_crochet 2x double_crochet into next 42 single_crochet double_crochet 2x into next single_crochet 2x double_crochet into the next 21 single_crochet slip to join do not turn round 10 chain 2 and double_crochet into next 21 double_crochet counting chain there should at 22 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into next 44 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into the next 22 double_crochet slip to join do not turn round 11 chain 2 and double_crochet into next 22 double_crochet counting chain there should at 23 double_crochet double_crochet
